title: Why is it so hard for people to be nice in this game.
body:
Like i just mute people who are being assholes now straight away. But I don't understand why people are such assholes in the first place. 

Like Iv'e stopped even trying to reason with people now. Usually when people start yelling at each other or someone starts hating on someone else I try to point out that highlighting how badly a team mate is playing is only going to make them play worse and really isn't helping.... but then that just makes them target me as well. 

Like where is the common human decency. What is it about this game (or this server) that turns what i'm sure are probably pretty normal people in real life, into vindictive and generally useless hate-machines online.

I know the anonymity is a huge factor but It consistently baffles me that people can't treat each other with even a modicum of respect.

Also legit question.... does it get any better when you get out of bronze?

Its like this at most lvls from what ive seen. Maybe not master tier but i was watching a diamond 4 smurf yesty and his teammate got super salty and mad for no reason.
The few plat\diamonds I have played with have been super chilled. But I'm guessing they are probably anomalies.

>What is it about this game (or this server) that turns what i'm sure are probably pretty normal people in real life, into vindictive and generally useless hate-machines online.

It's basically just how the internet works, because you don't have to use your face, being a dick for no reason is allowed, as there are no real repercussions.
because being mean is both easier and more fun.

Basically, this is classic victim-turned-bully. The dude is obviously depressed, and wants to take it out on others, even though it doesn't actually bring him joy like he tells himself it will. Its empty, hollow, and he's convinced that its not, because, after all, others on the internet seem to find such joy in it.
